page.title: 19Middlewood Way a Linear Park
page.content: The railway line which used to run from Marple through{Poynton}to Macclesfield has been taken up and a new path laid down so that walkers, cyclists and horse-riders can enjoy it.As it is flat it is quite easy walking and because it is gravelly you dont get muddy feet. There are lots of unusual flowers along the trail and you get a good view of parts of the {High Lane}area that are impossible to see from the road. It is so quiet along there that it is easy to forget that you are not very far from the main road, in the distance the buildings of the nearby towns can be seen.It is easy to get on to the trail from a variety of access points all along the route.This is an excellent use of an old railway line and brings the country to the town.
